title: Password Lockout
steps: User enters incorrect password 3 times, system locks account for 10 minutes
Check if lockout duration is set to 10 minutes
Verify the lockout duration is correctly applied
Test with a different password to confirm
Ensure no session is reset after lockout
Verify session is invalidated correctly

title: Password Reset
steps: User attempts to reset password via 'Forgot Password' link
System displays a password reset confirmation
Check if reset process is initiated successfully
Verify the user receives the confirmation email
Test with invalid credentials to confirm link availability
Ensure no system errors occur during reset

title: Error Message Display
steps: User enters invalid credentials, system shows error message
Check if error message is displayed correctly
Verify the message includes required fields
Test with multiple failed attempts
Ensure the error message is not redundant
Check if the error message is localized
expected: Error message displayed for invalid credentials

title: Dashboard Redirect
steps: Successful login redirect to dashboard
Verify the redirect URL is correct
Check if the user is redirected to the dashboard
Test with a different user or session
Ensure no redirects occur after lockout
Check if the redirect is successful

title: Password Reset Confirmation
steps: User attempts to reset password with incorrect credentials
System displays password reset confirmation
Check if confirmation is sent
Verify the user receives the confirmation email
Test with invalid credentials to confirm link availability
Ensure no system errors occur during reset

title: Invalid Credentials Error
steps: User enters invalid credentials
System displays error message
Check if the error message is correctly displayed
Test with multiple failed attempts
Verify the error message includes required fields
Ensure the error message is localized
expected: Error message displayed for invalid credentials
